t: Beauty & Wellness Briefing: Amazon's unauthorized beauty sellers are a 'pretty significant’ problem for brands
s: October 27, 2022 - Herbal skin-care brand Farmaesthetics has been selling on Amazon since 2017. In 2018, it joined Amazon’s “Transparency” program. As such, the brand attaches a QR code to all of its items, which are then verified by Amazon at the warehouse. Products without the code are rejected.
